sources.title: The Spy In White (1936)
sources.description: The Spy in White , released as The Secret of Stamboul  in the U.K., is a 1936 British  thriller film , taken from the novel  The Eunuch of Stamboul  by  Dennis Wheatley , directed by  Andrew Marton  and starring  Valerie Hobson ,  James Mason  and  Frank Vosper . It was made at  Shepperton Studios . The screenplay concerns a British agent who tries to thwart a revolution.

metadata.Plot: A look at the life of Florence Nightingale.
metadata.Writer: Mordaunt Shairp, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, Michael Jacoby
metadata.Actors: Kay Francis, Ian Hunter, Donald Woods
